title: Oceanic Streams
body:
Brought over from Old Forums

Ok so I've noticed a lot of people are making multiple threads about their streams.

What I was thinking is why not just bundle them all into one Thread, that way there will be a list and you can bump the thread whenever you're starting to stream?

Here's a list of not so well-known streamers, so feel free to add yours and I'll add you to the list.

www.twitch.tv/hullitude - (My own stream - The Man with the Skins/All types of Music and Games and Most followers NZ)
www.twitch.tv/imseaton - (Ian Wind, LoLNZ Pres)
www.twitch.tv/tigerlilygames - (Australian Female Streamer)
www.twitch.tv/xovolf - (Volf formerly of NZ Pro Team VGR)
www.twitch.tv/zerkd - (ADC for x5 Eclipse/Poachers)
www.twitch.tv/goldhedgehog_linuks - (Goldhedgehog artwork etc)
www.twitch.tv/carloylol - (Plat 2 NZ Streamer)
www.twitch.tv/kraserk - (NZ Streamer from Gold - Plat)
www.twitch.tv/Kray0nz - (NZ's resident Blitz god)
www.twitch.tv/exs_shadow - (Plat NZ Player going for Diamond)
www.twitch.tv/aliceraszor - (Aussie Streamer)
www.twitch.tv/elfishguy11 - (Up and coming shoutcaster)
www.twitch.tv/Snowypadre - (New Zealands Popular Shoutcaster)
www.twitch.tv/heavenzcurse - (Immunity's own Heavenz)
www.twitch.tv/im_lunaa_intel - (Immunity's own LuNAa)
www.twitch.tv/s2jinxy - (The S2 Girls)
www.twitch.tv/kimmberleyyy - (Another Aussie Female Streamer)
www.twitch.tv/teamdowntv1 - (Casting company which covers mostly CyberGamer Ladders)
www.twitch.tv/Oceanicgaming - (Weekly events and Diamond plays)
www.twitch.tv/emkaywhy - (Plat that mains quinn top)
www.twitch.tv/a6yog- (Worst Streamer you've ever heard of)
www.twitch.tv/Chizzele - (Australian Plat Streamer who plays almost every day)
www.twitch.tv/winterkitten - (up and coming Aus streamer)
www.twitch.tv/imxoana - (AU 5 man Streamer)
www.twitch.tv/soulbound_kitsune - (league, wow, blade and soul and occasionally pokemon)
www.twitch.tv/remery012 - (Streams most nights)
www.twitch.tv/myrren123 - (pretty much ONLY plays Syndra)
www.twitch.tv/GoGoGadgetLoL - (shoutcaster and generally stream competitive matches)
www.twitch.tv/salphinexo - (Gold-Plat Support Main pushing for Diamond)
www.twitch.tv/omgwowofficial - (Silver 1 Player)
www.twitch.tv/oceanwookie - (Music enthusiast and solo/5s player)
www.twitch.tv/hebuska - (Self-proclaimed Best ADC AUS)
www.twitch.tv/decaphiltrator - (Previously Gold/Plat player in NA)
www.twitch.tv/JackRyan72 - (LoL but occasionaly will stream raids on WoW)
www.twitch.tv/sm_limes - (16 yr old Platinum 4 jungler)
www.twitch.tv/zaptar - (Diamond 1 NA 220+ ping)
www.twitch.tv/condescendgaming - (Stream most days, very talkative with viewers, music and more)
www.twitch.tv/sikingaming - (streams most Sunday/Mondays - Gold 4 and WoW player)
www.twitch.tv/murakitty - (plat player aiming for diamond)
www.twitch.tv/kugzypoo - (Gold Player)
www.twitch.tv/aiko10 - ( learning the mechanics and champs of Mid)
www.twitch.tv/kidzlearn2play - (streams occasionally)
www.twitch.tv/flavourgaming - (streaming loads of ADC elo climbing) 
www.twitch.tv/nightmarelia - (Gold II player that plays with friends over Skype)
www.twitch.tv/sinlychi - (Teemo cookies for all)
www.twitch.tv/dlg_chooncha - (ADC player from Brisbane)
www.twitch.tv/smellslikecf - (Self proclaimed best Nami/Music OCE)
www.twitch.tv/timlimdimsim - ('sexy asian man streamer')
www.twitch.tv/neldyau - (Bronze 1 jungler, playing ranked)
www.twitch.tv/summoz
www.twitch.tv/firstmate_au 
www.twitch.tv/campo246
www.twitch.tv/savagedrake
www.twitch.tv/eMGVerkar
www.twitch.tv/ihascharms
www.twitch.tv/Boltbreak
www.twitch.tv/ryzeeeh
www.twitch.tv/hhaydn_ 
www.twitch.tv/mk_titus
www.twitch.tv/xxFear_In_Cubexx 
www.twitch.tv/frozenfire218 
www.twitch.tv/rjmetro
www.twitch.tv/uknowjiajun
www.twitch.tv/stokeez
www.twitch.tv/djblocka
www.twitch.tv/thehiddenpoet
www.twitch.tv//AuV2channel
www.twitch.tv/smileyfaceex
www.twitch.tv/mageofpie
www.twitch.tv/batsii
www.twitch.tv/tbtv_mysticnz
www.twitch.tv/swip3rrr
www.twitch.tv/raydere_lol
www.twitch.tv/ubergiantsbro
www.twitch.tv/minkywhale
www.twitch.tv/AVANTprofound
www.twitch.tv/rippiilol
www.twitch.tv/loserfruit
www.twitch.tv/electrum69
www.twitch.tv/global_lol (diamond ADC)
www.twitch.tv/therealveritas
www.twitch.tv/imasukai
www.twitch.com/hoody_au
www.twitch.tv/chuchuzs (Legacy eSports)

So yeah, let me know your stream, I'll edit it in and we can all share followers etc and help the OCE grow in terms of streamers. 

Thanks for taking the time to read this.

<3 you all.

replies.body:
twitch.tv/chuchuzs

Rank 6 challenger mid lane player from Legacy eSports!
Couldn't see him there so posted here!
twitch.com/hoody_au is a good oce stream too

I wish my net was good enough to stream :(

My channel is www.twitch.tv/imasukai but I just about never do because I haven't been graced by the almighty NBN yet.

I don't stream often but it's there for when I do.

http://www.twitch.tv/therealveritas
Thank you, your stream has been added to the list.
